title: My favourite watch face... but

author: Anthony Clark
comment: Great layout with all the info I need at a glance - clean and sharp. I am using the green/red color scheme. The ambient screen dims and the only thing to disappear of the sweep second hand. Battery life does not appear to be affected but have not had app long. I will update if any significant findings. The problem I have with the analog watch faces, in general, is the hands cover the info at certain times. Suggest make mini distinctive hour and minute hands at the outer edge so as not to cover any info.Thx!

reply.author: SmartWatchStudio
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback and 5stars rating! As for the second hand disappeared in dim mode - it is for saving battery (it refreshes every minute, not every second). You are right regarding the hands overlapping the widgets in analog watch faces. We have an idea on how to resolve this and we're going to suggest it in the next version.
